page.title: 01WARBLINGTON CUM EMSWORTH
page.content: Warblington is a district of Havant; Emsworth a small village on the Hants- West Sussex border which has found itself increasingly linked to Havant by housing developments.Havant,once a market town,is on the South Coast,67 miles from London,8 from Portsmouth and 9 from Chichester.The town is well served by British Rail with 2 lines to London via Guildford and via Horsham. There are Motorway links to the North and West.After long delay, work on the Havant-Chichester section of the M27, (Folkstone-Honiton Trunk Road has just started in the Summer of 1985. {Population}of Havant: 117,428 of which 9,535 live in Emsworth. {Early closing day}: Wednesday {Havant Museum}: East Street {Post Office}: 39 East Street {Police Station}: Civic Centre Road {Leisure Centre}: Civic Centre Road
